description: To provide cooks with military cook experience or relevant training and experience in institutional cooking to the Department of National Defence located in Garrison Petawawa, Ontario.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title: Kitchen Staff
#### Reference Number: WS3992737503-Doc3999507463

**Amendment Notice**
This notice serves as an amendment to the original request for proposal with changes to the closing date for submission of bids.

#### Notice Details
- **Public Announcement Date**: May 8, 2023
- **Amendment Date**: May 9, 2023
- **New Closing Date**: May 24, 2023 at 14:00 EDT
  All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 14:00 EDT on this date. Submissions made after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Tender Details

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for a contractor to provide up to 4 cooks/resource staff with military cooking experience or equivalent training and work experience. The statement of requirement outlines the skills and qualifications required for this position.

#### Contact Details
For inquiries or clarification on this tender, please contact:

Shamael Malko-Moore
Department of Public Works and Government Services
(venture Title)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Access the Tender Documents
For complete details and to access the tender documents, please visit:
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16206765?extsite=MTYyMDY3NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16206765?extsite=MTYyMDY3NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Statement of Requirement

The DND located in Garrison Petawawa, Ontario requires the services of a contractor to provide up to 4 cooks with military cooking experience, or an equivalent combination of training and related work experience. The contractor must provide the required resources for a specified period. The full statement of requirement is included in the tender documents. 

Note:
- This is a competitive tendering (Request for Proposal) process. 
- The low price will be the selection criterion for this bid. 
- The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender.
- All bids must be in the English language. 
- This tender
